Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 秋 indicates the sound; 鳥 (bird) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 秋 [ qiū ] autumn, fall; year
    • 鳥 [ niǎo ] bird
①(秃鹙)一种头颈无毛而性贪馋的水鸟。

鶖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiū］
［《廣韻》七由切，平尤，清。］
亦作“1”。“鹙1”的繁体字。
鸟名。秃鹙。

鶖字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶖； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1494第26
【廣韻】七由切【集韻】【韻會】雌由切，?音秋。【玉篇】水鳥也。一名扶老。【崔豹·古今注】扶老，禿秋也。狀如鶴而大。【詩·小雅】有鶖在梁。【本草】李時珍曰：禿鶖，水鳥之大者。靑蒼色，長頸赤目，頭項皆無毛，其項皮紅色，如鶴頂，其喙深黃色而扁直，長尺餘。凡鳥至秋毛脫禿，此鳥頭禿如秋毨，如老人頭童，及扶老之杖，故一名扶老。?雅，鶖性貪惡，今俗呼禿鶖。○按禿鶖，《說文》作?。俗曰鷀䳓，如鵜鶘，爪如雞。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鹙; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1494 Page 26
[Guang Yun] Qiyouqie【Jiyun】【Yunhui】female youqie,? Yinqiu. [Jade articles] Water birds are also. A helper. [Cui Bao · Ancient and Modern Note] Helping the old, bald autumn. It looks like a crane and is big. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】There are 鹙 in the beam. [Materia Medica] Li Shizhen said: The bald bird is the greatest of waterfowl. It is blue with long neck and red eyes. Its head and nape are all hairless. Its nape is red like a crane's top. Its bill is dark yellow and flat and straight, and it is more than a foot long. Every bird loses its hair until autumn, and the bird's head is as bald as autumn, like an elderly head boy, and a rod for supporting the old, so a supporting old man. ? Ya, greed and greed, today is called bald vulgar. ○ Press bald 鹙, "Suo Wen" is written?. It is said that the falcon is like a pelican, and its claws are like a chicken.
